    public class BoardModel
extends javax.swing.JTable
    Name: KÃ¶nigsreiter Simon Class: 3CHIF Date: 2017-03-24 Project: jessy Desc.: The model for the Graphic ChessBoard. This is mostly the Graphical Model of a ChessBoard, and not rather the underlying table.
